<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/transactions/{transaction_hash}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The single transaction endpoint provides information on a specific transaction.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
